articles.title: For the most vulnerable Americans, these clinics are trusted, accessible and vital to vaccine rollout - USA TODAY
articles.description: Federally Qualified Health Centers could be key to vaccinating hard-hit populations, experts say. They're now set to get extra doses.
articles.content:
Communities of color around the U.S. have been lost in the rollout of COVID-19 vaccines, but these Good Samaritans in Chicago are trying to help.
